text: Ocobla is an unincorporated community in Neshoba County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== The community takes its name from Ocobla Creek, which flows near the site. A post office called Ocobla was established in 1886, and remained in operation until 1903. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Neshoba County, Mississippi
title: Ocobla, Mississippi
